title: Hindi: Bollywood Classics - Lata Mangeshkar (mega compilation)
description:
Hindi: Bollywood Classics - Lata Mangeshkar (mega compilation) 

Lata Mangeshkar (September 28, 1929) The Nightingale of India. My favourite singer ever. She is one of the best-known playback singers in the Hindi movie industry. Lata Mangeshkar's career started in 1942 and has spanned over six and a half decades. She has sung in over 980 Bollywood movies and in over twenty regional Indian languages, mostly in the Hindi. She is the elder sister of the equally accomplished singer Asha Bhosle.
